resources.string:
"Hello and welcome to nostalgia in the 21st century!


If you have not played snake before then do not worry it is very simple.


What is the Aim? 
 •To try and eat as much food as possible
 •To stay inside the walls of the game
 •Do not eat yourself!
 •Try and get the highest score possible
 •Most importantly HAVE FUN!!




Controls 
 for the controls you have 2 options:
 1. use the buttons provided
 2. use voice commands (beware of the lag!!)


to use voice commands either say "Up", "Down" , "Left", or "right" 

 you can turn voice commands off in the settings.
